other_tests.findings: Asymptomatic bradycardia, QT interval prolongation to 0.57 s, and nonsustained polymorphic ventricular tachycardia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial ECG showed normal sinus rhythm with a QTc of 0.412 s; after treatment with voriconazole, QTc prolonged to 0.57 s and subsequently normalized to 0.43 s after discontinuation of voriconazole.

other_tests.findings: Several asymptomatic episodes of polymorphic, nonsustained ventricular tachycardia.
